comments: Attendance is important, so show up. Lectures lead up to information needed for the take home mid-term and Final. Patience is the key to passing this class, for lectures can become sort of boring depending on how active your peer are or aren\'t. Other than that, this class is an easy B. and A accessible.

For the class there is only a midterm and the final. No homework or in class assignments. Both the midterm and final are very time consuming but if you take your time then you\'ll do fine. Teacher is extremely helpful and makes the lecture interesting! Highly recommend her!

I loved her. She is knowledeable & only assigns a mid-term & final. Although she only assigns a midterm & final & allows the book for it, they are intense & take time to complete. Do well on both & you\'ll receive an A in the class.
Very good teacher. Just do read the text book.
She is a cool teacher has as great attitude and know hers stuff its a laid back class no homework your grade is based on a midterm and final and the mideterm and final is 30 pgs each good luck
expect way too much for midterm and final. kool teacher in class test would be way better
kool teacher gives take home midterm and final she ask for way too much. its very time consuming she gives enough time but in test would be better
